name: agentloop
description: Autonomous agentic developer loop — PRD to production with VibeKanban task management, hookify enforcement, and cross-session memory
author: showard

hookify@claude-plugins-official.purpose: Rule enforcement — blocks/warns on stop without VK update, tests, AC verification

claude-mem@thedotmack.purpose: Cross-session semantic memory via ChromaDB vector search
claude-mem@thedotmack.note: Loop runs without it — memory steps are skipped gracefully

superpowers@claude-plugins-official.purpose: Enhanced coding workflows — brainstorming, TDD, systematic debugging, code review

code-review@claude-plugins-official.purpose: Automated code review on PRs and completed work

pr-review-toolkit@claude-plugins-officia.purpose: Specialized PR review agents — type analysis, silent failure hunting, test coverage

dev-browser@dev-browser-marketplace.purpose: Chrome DevTools integration for visual verification of web UI

vibe_kanban.purpose: Task management — source of truth for all task statuses

mobile.purpose: iOS/Android simulator and device testing via accessibility tree
mobile.note: Only needed for mobile app projects
